content.default: You can not do that. You need at least moderator level %required_level% to do this
content.description: Message that gets send if the user doesn't has the required role and/or has not the required mod-level
content.default-de: You can not do that. You need at least moderator level %required_level% to do this

content.default: I could not find this user - try using an ID or a mention
content.description: Message that gets send if the user provided an invalid userid
content.default-de: I could not find this user - try using an ID or a mention

content.description: Message that gets send if the user does not provide a reason and 'require reason' is activated

content.default: You can not perform this action on your college.
content.description: Message that gets send if the user tries to mute another moderator
content.default-de: You can not perform this action on your college.

content.default: Thanks for reporting %user%. I notified our server team and transmitted them an [encrypted snapshot](<%mURL%>) of the current messages in this channel, so they can see what really happened. Please make sure that our bots and staff can message you, so we can ask you follow-up-questions, if needed.
content.description: Message that gets send, if someone reports somebody.

params.name: %user%
params.description: Tag of the user they reported

content.default-de: Thanks for reporting %user%. I notified our server team and transmitted them an [encrypted snapshot](<%mURL%>) of the current messages in this channel, so they can see what really happened. Please make sure that our bots and staff can message you, so we can ask you follow-up-questions, if needed.

content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they got muted

content.default: You got channel-muted from %channel% for **%reason%** by %user%!
content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they got muted

params.name: %channel%
params.description: Channel from which the user got muted

content.default: Your channel-mute from %channel% got removed because of **%reason%** by %user%!
content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they got muted

params.name: %channel%
params.description: Channel from which the user got unmuted

content.default: You got temporarily muted for **%reason%** by %user%! This action is going to expire on %date%.
content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they got temporarily muted
content.default-de: You got temporarily muted for **%reason%** by %user%! This action is going to expire on %date%.

content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they get quarantined

content.default: You got quarantined temporarily for **%reason%** by %user%! This action is going to expire on %date%
content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they get quarantined

params.name: %date%
params.description: Date when the quarantine is going to be removed automatically

content.default-de: You got quarantined temporarily for **%reason%** by %user%! This action is going to expire on %date%

content.description: Message that gets send to a user when they get unquarantined
